Classes/HermesEndpoint/Errors.html#/s:FO.name: internal
Classes/HermesEndpoint/Errors.html#/s:FO.abstract: Internal error of this endpoint. See reason for details.

Classes/HermesEndpoint/Origin.html#/s:vV.name: address
Classes/HermesEndpoint/Origin.html#/s:vV.abstract: Dedicated base address for all depending services for provided login.

Classes/HermesEndpoint.html#/s:C6Hermes1.name: ConcreteTransport
Classes/HermesEndpoint.html#/s:C6Hermes1.abstract: Transport type constraint. As for now used FoundationHTTP, but it should be generic.

Classes/HermesEndpoint/Origin.html.name: Origin
Classes/HermesEndpoint/Origin.html.abstract: Origin structure packed with essential data that you need to communicate with other cloud Acronis services.

Classes/HermesEndpoint.html#/s:FC6Hermes.name: origin(for:)
Classes/HermesEndpoint.html#/s:FC6Hermes.abstract: The only API method for retrieving base address for all Cloud Acronis services.

Classes/HermesEndpoint/Errors.html.name: Errors
Classes/HermesEndpoint/Errors.html.abstract: Errors related to server logic or this enpoint itself.

Classes/HermesEndpoint.html.name: HermesEndpoint
Classes/HermesEndpoint.html.abstract: Endpoint in terms of Neuro for communication with Boris server(s).

Classes/HermesExplorer/Receipt.html.name: Receipt
Classes/HermesExplorer/Receipt.html.abstract: Receipt is pack of the requirements that you have to provide in order to get back instance of HermesEndpoint.

Classes/HermesExplorer.html#/s:FC6Hermes.name: init()
Classes/HermesExplorer.html#/s:FC6Hermes.abstract: Designated and the only initializer. You’re able to create as many instances

Classes/HermesExplorer.html#/s:FC6Hermes.name: explore(with:)
Classes/HermesExplorer.html#/s:FC6Hermes.abstract: Fabric method for vending instances of HermesEndpoint. Basically you need only one, but it’s all up to you.

Classes/HermesExplorer.html.name: HermesExplorer
Classes/HermesExplorer.html.abstract: Explorer for HermesEndpoint in terms of Neuro. Actually it is a fabric for those endpoints.
